title: Mufasa: The Lion King (2024) Movie Preview
description:
In this episode of our KinoCheck Originals you will learn everything we already know about the upcoming Mufasa: The Lion King! | Subscribe ➤ https://abo.yt/ki | More episodes ➤ #KinoCheckOriginals
"The Lion King" from 1994 is undeniably one of the best-known and most popular Disney movies of all time. The story around Simba, Mufasa and other characters still inspires numerous viewers today. As we have known for a while, the spin-off "Mufasa: The Lion King" about Simba's iconic father will be released next year. In this Original, you can find out all the latest details about the new Disney film.
